alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 6:46PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern St. Johns County through 715 PM EDT... At 646 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crescent Beach, or 12 miles east of Hastings, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marineland, Crescent Beach, Butler Beach and Dupont Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
